flashmode: Fill-flash Fill-flash with slow sync Red-eye reduction Red-eye reduction with slow sync Rear curtain sync Rear curtain with slow sync Off
picturecontrol: Standard Neutral Vivid Monochrome Portrait Landscape Selected Picture Control can be modified User-customizable Settings
moviemeteringmethod: Matrix Center-weighted: Meters 4.5 mm circle in center of frame Spot: Meters 2 mm circle centered on select focus area
afareamode: Single-point AF: 135 focus areas; the center 73 areas support phase-detection AF Auto-area AF: 41 focus areas Subject tracking Face-priority AF
operatingenvironment: 14 to 104deg.F (-10 to 40deg.C) on land; 32 to 104deg.F (0 to 40deg.C) in water
movie: HD: 1920 x 1080/60i HD: 1920 x 1080/30p HD: 1280 x 720/60p HD: 1280 x 720/30p Slow-motion: 640 x 240/400fps Slow-motion: 320 x 120/1200fps Motion Snapshot: 1920 x 1080/60p (plays at 24p) Audio file format: ACC Movie file format: MOV
autofocussystem: Hybrid autofocus (phase detection/contrast-detect AF) AF-assist illuminator
focusmodes: Auto (AF) Auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A) Single-Servo AF (AF-S) Continuous-Servo (AF-C) Full-time Servo (AF-F) Manual Focus (MF)
meteringmethod: Matrix Center-weighted: Meters 4.5 mm circle in center of frame Spot: Meters 2 mm circle centered on select focus area
flashcompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
filesystem: Compliant with DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0 DPOF (Digital Print Order Format) EXIF 2.3 (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras) PictBridge
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single AF)
scenemodes: Portrait Landscape Night Landscape Night Portrait Close-up Auto Underwater
pictureangle: Approx. 2.7x lens focal length (Nikon CX format)
interface: USB: Hi-speed USB HDMI output: Type C mini-pin HDMI connector
moviemetering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
supportedlanguages: Arabic Bengali Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) Czech Danish Dutch English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Hungarian Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Norwegian Persian Polish Portuguese (European and Brazilian) Romanian Russian Spanish Swedish Tamil Thai Turkish Ukrainian Vietnamese
acadapter: EH-5b AC Adapter Requires EP-5C Power Supply Connector
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash unit is fully charged
exposuremodes: Programmed Auto with flexible Program (P) Shutter-Priority Auto (S) Aperture-Priority Auto (A) Manual (M) Scene Auto Selector
shootingmodes: Advanced movie mode (includes slow motion) Auto Photo mode Best Moment Capture mode (includes Slow View and Smart Photo Selector) Creative mode (including: P, S, A, M, Night Landscape, Underwater, Night Portrait, Backlighting, Soft, Easy Panorama, Miniature Effect and Selective Color) Motion Snapshot (16:9)
fileformat: Compressed 12-bit NEF (RAW) JPEG: JPEG-Baseline compliant with fine (approx 1:4), normal (approx 1:8), or basic (approx 1:16) compression NEF (RAW) + JPEG: Single photograph recorded in both NEF (RAW) and JPEG formats
topcontinuousshootingspeed: 15 frames per second with AF; 30/60 fps with focus locked on first frame (at full resolution)
whitebalance: Auto Incandescent Fluorescent Direct Sunlight Flash Cloudy Shade Preset Manual Underwater All except preset manual with fine tuning
flashcontrol: i-TTL flash control using image sensor available
